item.title: What you might have missed in Berkshire's very last annual meeting led by Warren Buffett
item.description: The investment sage, who turns 95 years old in August, is handing over the reins after a legendary six-decade run at the conglomerate.

item.title: There’s ‘massive’ opportunity as seniors grow old at home — these names should benefit, says William Blair
item.description: William Blair says two companies in particular are among those most affected by aging-in-place trend.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts favor these stocks for the long haul
item.description: Here are three stocks favored by the Street's top pros, according to TipRanks.

item.title: AI drives growth for a few Chinese companies. Analysts share their picks
item.description: Spending on artificial intelligence helped give some Chinese tech companies a boost in the first quarter, despite economic headwinds.

item.title: Nuclear power investment is growing rapidly. Goldman says these stocks offer ways to play it
item.description: The policy environment has become favorable for nuclear with President Donald Trump signing several executive orders to support the industry.
